featured.text: In 1498, Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama made the first sea voyage to India, via the southernmost tip of Africa.

definition.zh_def: 伽馬，通常指伽馬射線或伽馬波，是一種高能電磁輻射。
definition.en_def: Gamma, often referring to gamma rays or gamma waves, is a form of high-energy electromagnetic radiation.
definition.example: Gamma rays are used in cancer treatment to target and destroy tumor cells.
